field.name: summary
field.value: System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException when trying to access NHibernate proxy class properties using reflection

field.name: description
field.value:
Properties overidden by DP have the incorrect signature (no HasThis on signature). This caused an AmbiguousMatchException when trying to use reflection to access the properties on the DP created class.
This was narrowed down to a bug in the .Net Framework. SP1 of .Net 2.0 now has a new override for DefineProperty() that allows a signature to be specified.
Discussion on subject in forum here: http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?t=3145
